properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rajulaku rajaina Yesu prabhuvu ranai yunnaadu (2) Eththabadedavaa leka viduvabadedavaa ? (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Telisikontiva neeventha ghorapaapivo Siluvapai theerchegaa nee paaparunamun (2) Oppukonina paapamun kshaminchunu Yesu Leni edala viduvabadedavu siddapadumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Buddhileni kanyalavale mosapotivaa Cheyalevu prabhu seva nee shakhtitho Nooneleka bramatho bratikedava Leni yedala viduvabadedavu siddapaduma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaakhyamukai jeevitam appagimpaka Daachitivaa talaantulanu lekkacheyaka Modati premanu thirigi ponduma Leni yedala nashtah poduvu siddapadumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praanamichchi vimochinchi nee premato Krupanu batti nadipitivi naadu yaatralo Mugiyuvaraku siddaparachu nee rakakai Halleluya halleluya halleluya{/lang-eng}
